short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Share-A-Cart for Walmart allows you to share the contents of your cart with anyone else.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Share-A-Cart is the easiest way to share the contents of your Walmart shopping cart with anyone else! No more moving items from cart to wishlist and backwards, simply "Send Cart" directly to your friend via a short id code. The id code is then used to load your cart from anywhere and anyone you shared this code with.

Now supporting Walmart.com and Walmart Grocery!

Share-A-Cart is available for Amazon as well: https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/peiobddfomnijgoblelfdmjblplojcoe/
